traits.name: Frozen Flesh
traits.desc: A creature that touches the alchemist or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alchemist makes two freezing strike attacks.

actions.name: Freezing Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage and the target's movement speed is reduced by 10 on its next turn. If the alchemist hits the same target with both of its freezing strike attacks in a single round, the target is restrained until the end of their next turn instead.
